name: We Have a Problem (Dumb Luck)
description:
WE HAVE A PROBLEM FO R G LOB AL G AM E JA M 2022 1935 1940 708 DARE 1956 1209 102 8102 1987 044 0HI MOM 1976 1031 1984 1954 1103 MIG HTY 1864 103 714 1993 0222 052 1968 2450 746 WAT CH 716 THI NGS 602 104 6104 1995 322 90 1931 1701 51 OU T18 908 2114 85 3504 105 08 2001 713 079 1940 LV 426 HE RE 1206 1979 402 795 106 31 2017 429 65 871 1031 541 CO ME S Q 001 27 05 DUMB LUCK
INTRACTIVE CO-OP The Intergalactic Space Station has been badly damaged during your routine space exercises. Unfortunately, you and your co-astronaut were in separate places when the shower hit, and now your best chance of survival and recovery of the Station is to get to the Bridge as fast as possible.
But that's obviously easier said than done.
Good luck.

Grab a friend, grab a couch, and co-operate! Try to make it to the Bridge to contact New Houston in this 3d first-person split-screen co-op escape room game.

PLATFORMS

Made in Unity.

Windows Mac Linux / Unix CREW

We're the astronauts who made this game! (And shout-out to the Sci-Fi Style Modular Pack!!)

Name Role Anthony Mendez Project manager, Voice acting, Puzzle development Ellie Gargiulo Programming, Level design, UI / UX design, Puzzle development Miles Cumiskey 3D models and art Ciomara Valentine 2D art and title screen Meaghanne McBride Audio. Every all the audio Evan Bianco Dialog writing, Voice acting Nina Navazio Writing support, Monitor UI design, itch.io page design, Puzzle design

Using the LCARS Inspired Website Template designed & developed by Jim Robertus www.TheLCARS.com.
